definition: to think/to believe/to suppose/to wish/to want/to miss (feel wistful about the absence of sb or sth)
to consider from all angles (idiom); to think hard/to rack one's brains

sentences.english: The meditator in the photograph is sitting too low.
sentences.chinese: 图中的冥想者坐得太低。

sentences.english: Some types of yoga also involve meditation and chanting.
sentences.chinese: 一些瑜伽也会伴随着冥想和咏唱。

sentences.english: He explores and meditates about various meaningful questions which are being carried by human beings.
sentences.chinese: 他探求并冥想着作为人类所承载的各种意义问题。

sentences.english: Many hospitals and health centers offer classes in mindfulness meditation.
sentences.chinese: 很多医院和健康中心提供留神冥想课程。

sentences.english: If you never meditate before, this is a wonderful opportunity to do it for the first time.
sentences.chinese: 如果你从没冥想过，这是你们尝试的好机会。

sentences.english: I want to do a group meditation.
Meditation teaches us mind over matter.
sentences.chinese: 默坐冥想让我们学到心灵更胜于物质。

sentences.english: For discussion of Orin Meditations and books…
sentences.chinese: 欧林的冥想及书籍讨论分享及活动。

sentences.english: Take a two-minute breathing break several times during the day.
sentences.chinese: 一天当中，可以进行多次只需两分钟的冥想。

sentences.english: This word must be repeated with meditation upon its meaning.
sentences.chinese: 常念此词，并冥想它的意义。

sentences.english: Meditating without food does not prove that he is reincarnation of Buddha.
sentences.chinese: 能冥想而不禁食不能证明他是达摩转世。

sentences.english: The director noodled for two days for only one scene.
sentences.chinese: 就为了一个镜头，导演苦思冥想了两天时间。

sentences.english: The concept of failure in meditation is profoundly disempowering.
sentences.chinese: 在冥想中“失败”这个概念是万万不可去碰的。

sentences.english: Long-term practice of OM meditation is also thought to result in enduring changes in mental and brain function.
sentences.chinese: 长期的OM冥想练习会引起精神和脑功能的持久变化。

sentences.english: I meditate for half an hour, by Jove I feel better.
sentences.chinese: 我冥想了半个小时，天哪，我感觉好多了。

sentences.english: This sort of meditation focuses on non-judgmental awareness of sensations and feelings.
sentences.chinese: 这类冥想关注情感和感觉上非判断性的意识。

definition: to sit quietly/to meditate/to stage a sit-in
to sit cross-legged/to sit in the lotus position
sleep/to sleep/(computing) to enter sleep mode
(of Taoists) to practice austerities/to practice asceticism
